ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Committee Report filed on 2016-10-17
          -House Committee Report No.13 substituted by HB No. 4113 (in substitution of HB No. 152, 472, 483, 509, 580, 1046, 1382, 1644, 1912, 2838, 3224, 3445, 3513, 3645 & 3650)
      2. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2016-11-29
          -Discussion on the Status of Committee Report No. 13 Re. House Bill No. 4113 (In substitution of House Bill Nos. 152, 472, 483, 509, 580, 1046, 1382, 1644, 1912, 2838, 3224, 3445, 3513, 3645, and 3650), entitled "An Act Increasing the Maternity Leave Period to One Hundred (100) Days for Female Workers in the Government Service & in the Private Sector, Granting an Option to Extend for An Additional Thirty (30) days Without Pay".
      3. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2016-12-12
      4. Committee Report Approved on 2018-08-28
          -Approved on 2nd Reading
      5. Under Bicameral Conference Committee Deliberation on 2018-10-01
          -The Senate and House Panel approved the Bicameral Conference Committee Report consolidating Senate Bill No. 1305 with House Bill No. 4113 on expanding the maternity leave benefit to one hundred five (105) days with an option to extend for an additional thirty (30) days without pay and granting an additional fifteen (15) days for solo mothers.
          -Bicameral Conference Committee Meeting to reconcile the disagreeing provisions of Senate Bill No. 1305 (Expanded Maternity Leave Law) and House Bill 4113 (100-Day Maternity Leave Law)
